entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
